body.name: USB C to Dual HDMI Adapter 4K 60hz, 7 in 1 USB C Docking Station with 2 HDMI Displayport VGA Hub, USB C Splitter 4 Monitors Extended Display, USB C Adapter Multiport Dongle for MacBook/Dell/HP/Lenovo
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 28 mins

features: 7 in 1 USB C Multiple Display Adapter: USB C docking station expands a single usb type c port to Dual HDMI port 4K(1*60HZ + 1* 30HZ), 1*4K@60HZ DP,1*1080P VGA,3* standard USB 2.0 ports. ❤Note: Only Windows OS can extend 4 monitors(MST supported),macOS doesn’t support Extend mode as the macOS limitation. HDMI 2 and DP can work at 4K@60hz at the same time while source is DP1.4 (Laptop is DP1.4 source).

USB C to Dual HDMI Docking Station: For Windows OS, you can connect four additional same or different displays (ABCD and AAAA display mode). The four additional monitors will display the same content on Mac OS(ABBB or AAAA),due to macOS limitation.

Dual 4K 60HZ Output: This USB C hub adapter support HDMI 2 and Displayport up to 3840*2160 4K 60HZ simultaneity output (the laptop specification must be DP1.4 signal output, or it will be 30HZ); USB C to 1080P VGA Adapter compatible for VGA projectors, stream video to a HDTV, or connect to a projector for a presentation.

Plug and play: Driver free USB C to DP multiport adapter, instantly extend displays for your laptops, tablets etc. * USB-C port of your host support DP Alt Mode is required. More connectivity options: 3 extra USB 2.0 with transfer speeds 480Mbps allows you to connect keyboard or mouse without any lag, due to the USB 3.0 radio frequency interference to the wireless connection, it is better to connect your wireless device to the USB 2. 0 ports.

Wide compatibility: This usb c multiple display dongle compatible with Thunderbolt 3/4 or USB C port support video output or DP Alt Mode like Dell XPS13/15,Lenovo Yoga 720/910/920/930,Microsoft Surface Book 2/ Surface Go/ Surface Laptop 3,Dell Latitude 13 7000/Latitude 13 E7370 etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WAVLINK 7-IN-1 USB C Quad Display Docking Station for HP/Dell/Lenovo/Mac/Surface Previous page Next page This multiport adapter seamlessly expands your laptop's connectivity, allowing you to connect to multiple displays and a variety of USB A peripherals. With wide compatibility and no external driver required, it's the perfect solution for enhancing your productivity.

On Mac (Only supports extend 1 external monitor with different content) NOTICES: (X) Mac OS Not Support 4 Displays. All external monitor images are same on MacOS due to OS system limit 1) Dual Display: (ABB) HDMI1+DP/HDMI2: 4K@30Hz+4K@30Hz(DP1.4&DP1.2); HDMI2+DP: 4K@60Hz+4K@60Hz(DP1.4&DP1.2) HDMI1+VGA: 1080P@60Hz+1080P@60Hz(DP1.4&DP1.2); VGA+DP/HDMI2: 1080P@60Hz+1080P@60Hz(DP1.4&DP1.2) 2) Triple Display:(ABBB) HDMI1+HDMI2+DP: 3x4K@30Hz(DP1.4&DP1.2); HDMI1+HDMI2+VGA: 3x1080P@60Hz(DP1.4&DP1.2) HDMI2+DP+VGA: 3x1080P@60Hz(DP1.4&DP1.2); HDMI1+DP+VGA: 3x1080P@60Hz(DP1.4&DP1.2) 3)Quad Display: (ABBBB) HDMI1+HDMI2+DP+VGA: 4x1080P@60Hz(DP1.4&DP1.2) Notice: Please make sure the type-C port of your host supports video output

On Windows (Some laptops only support 3monitors due to graphic card limitation) 1) Dual Display:(ABC) HDMI1+DP/HDMI2: 4K@30Hz+4K@60Hz(DP1.4); 4K@30Hz+4K@30Hz(DP1.2)；HDMI2+DP: 4K@60Hz+4K@60Hz(DP1.4); 4K@30Hz+4K@60Hz(DP1.2) HDMI1+VGA: 4K@30Hz+1080P@60Hz(DP1.4); 4K@30Hz+1080P@60Hz(DP1.2)；VGA+DP/HDMI2: 1080P@60Hz+4K@60Hz(DP1.4); 1080P@60Hz+4K@60Hz(DP1.2) 2) Triple Display:(ABCD) HDMI1+HDMI2+DP: 4K@30Hz+4K@60Hz+4K@30Hz or 4K@30Hz+4K@30Hz+4K@60Hz or 1080P@30Hz+4K@60Hz+4K@60Hz(DP1.4); 3x1080P@60Hz(DP1.2) HDMI1+HDMI2+VGA: 4K@30Hz+4K@60Hz+1080P@60Hz(DP1.4); 3x1080P@60Hz(DP1.2)；HDMI2+DP+VGA: 4K@60Hz+4K@60Hz+1080P@60Hz(DP1.4); 3x1080P@60Hz(DP1.2) HDMI1+DP+VGA: 4K@30Hz+4K@60Hz+1080P@60Hz(DP1.4); 3x1080P@60Hz(DP1.2) 3)Quad Display： HDMI1+HDMI2+DP+VGA: 4x1080P@60Hz(DP1.4); Not Supported(DP1.2)

USB-C Devices Compatibility List (Partial) Apple Mac Studio 2022, iMac(2017, 2019, 2020), MacBook Pro 16-inch (2019, 2021)，MacBook Air 13-inch (2018, 2019, 2020)， MacBook Pro 13-inch (2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020)，MacBook Pro 14-inch 2021, MacBook Pro 15-inch (2016, 2017, 2018, 2019); Dell XPS 13 7390 2-in-1 (Ice Lake),XPS 12 9250, XPS 13 9350, XPS 13 9360,XPS 13 9370,XPS 13 9380,XPS 15 9550 (Intel + Nvidia GPU),XPS 15 9550 (Intel GPU),XPS 15 9560 (Intel + Nvidia GPU), XPS 15 9570,XPS 17 9700,XPS 12 XPS9250, LATITUDE 7480,Alienware 13 R3,Alienware 15 R3,Alienware 17 R4, Precision 15 M7510, Precision 17 M7710, XPS 13 9365, Precision 15 5000 Series (5510), Precision 15 3000 Series (3510), Latitude 7370 (3C7XP), Latitude 12 7275, Alienware 17 R3; HP HP EliteBook Folio G1 (Model V1C43EA), Spectre x360 Convertible 13-w000 (SKU W9A95AV), Spectre x360 - 13-ac003la, Spectre x360 - 15-ch000, Elite X2 1012 G1, HP Spectre x360 - 13-ae011dx (Late 2017)，Elite x2 1012 G2，HP Spectre x360 (2017)，HP EliteBook Folio G1 12.5", HP ZBook 15 G3, HP Zbook 17 G3 Workstation, HP ZBook Studio Series, HP Elite X2 1012 G1, HP Spectre x360 2-in-1 13-W023DX 13.3"; Intel Intel NUC8i7HVK (Hades Canyon), NUC8i7HNK (Hades Canyon), NUC9VXQNX (Ghost Canyon), Intel NUC9V7QNX (Ghost Canyon), Intel NUC9i9QNX (Ghost Canyon), Intel NUC9i7QNX (Ghost Canyon), Intel NUC9i5QNX (Ghost Canyon); Lenovo Lenovo Thinkpad P50, Thinkpad P51, Thinkpad P70, Lenovo Yoga C930, Lenovo X1 Carbon 7th Gen, ThinkPad P70 Series Mobile Workstation, Lenovo Legion Y720, Lenovo ThinkPad T570, Lenovo Miix 720, Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon (5th Gen 2017), Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga (2nd Gen 2017), Lenovo ThinkPad P50; Others MSI VR Ready GS43VR Phantom Pro-006; ASUS ZenBook Pro UX501VW and more.

Systems/ Devices Compatibility Plug and play on Windows 11/10/8.1/8/7, Mac OS 10.8 or later, Chrome OS, Linux, iPad OS, Harmony OS, Android. Works with your USB-C Desktop PCs, Laptops, Tablets/Mobile Phones(OTG function required).

Widely Applicable From online conferences and stock business to code writing and office multitasking, this USB C dongle can handle it all. Explore various operating modes like Mirror, Extend, Clamshell, and Rotation to adapt to your unique needs. No Driver Required Plug and play, say goodbye to the complicated setup process—simply connect and start using. We prioritize your convenience, making your daily operations smoother than ever before. Durable Nylon Cable The upstream USB C cable is covered by nylon material, which has a higher tensile strength, minimises tangling, and has a longer service life than regular cords. Portable & Stylish This docking station measures 11.0x5.8x1.9cm/4.3x2.3x0.7in and weighs 85g/3.0oz. Its compact size and light weight allow it to easily fit into your computer bag or briefcase, making it convenient for you to use it anywhere. Its frosted silver case is fingerprint resistant and adds a stylish touch to the dock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked for three displays!
reviews.reviewText: Connect to laptop for three displays. Works well and plug and play with Windows 11.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars USB3.2 to dual HDMI splitter, works well
reviews.reviewText: I'm very pleased. It does run 2 HDMI monitors well from my 3.2 USB cheapy notebook port for most applications but IMHO this is not a gamer solution. Screens are clear and smooth running but will be a bit slower in response time. Only issue I had is the USB C adaptor is a bit wide and I had to use it with a narrow USB-C male to female cable adaptor to allow my power cable to fit. Still have my tiny ASUS BR-1100 notebook screen running too. 3 extended mode monitors total.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with Pixel 6a
reviews.reviewText: Works fine with my Pixel 6a. Be sure to install the driver app first, and have the external monitor connected and powered on before connecting to the phone. Upon connecting, it asks yo to choose full screen mirror or single app mode and you're all set. Handy device if your phone doesn't support USB C alt mode video.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dual monitor hub
reviews.reviewText: I used on an older Acer computer . Followed the instructions for the driver worked perfectly. I tried other units with no instructions no drivers. This was super easy to use highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased a new Laptop with no internet connection port. Yes I can just connect wirelessly but I prefer to be hard wired. Also had a wireless mouse and 2 monitors with HDMI connections so this device connected them all while extending my desktop. You will need to install the driver's but that is very simple takes only a couple of minutes. I have not experienced any lagging while working from home so that is a good thing. Well worth the money!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was honestly skeptical about this product and it was at the price that had me questioning whether to waste my money on something that would not work and i would never use.. thankfully it worked perfectly.. Windows picked up the drivers automatically and boom!! Two independent screens and my laptop screen working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product works for my older laptop!!
reviews.reviewText: First thing: you need to go to the website www. Wavlink then select drivers, enter your product number and click on search. Scroll your screen down and you will see your product listed. Click on it and select windows version of your computer. Files will be downloaded. Once that step is done, double click on the folder. Two files appear, select x86 folder. Double click on the Exe file. Now connect the extra monitor with hdmi to the wavlink box and usb connector to your laptop. Wala!!! Now I’m able to get two monitors connected to my older laptop (only had one hdmi port). This is a game changer for me!!! Please follow the instructions that comes in the box!! You will need to tell your laptop which screen is which(left, middle, right) so your mouse can get to those screens easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and easy install - Works as described
reviews.reviewText: Quick and easy install - Works as described
Produto excelente, superou minhas expectativas! Fácil de instalar, manual e site completo. Super indico.
Funciona genial para usar un segundo monitor, ventaja el que trae entrada usb y usb c, buena calidad en sus materiales

This is A great Amazon shopping experience and journey. First, the product quality is excellent, the workmanship of WAVLINK is solid, and the touch and feel is extraordinary. I have used many branded or non-branded HDMI HUBs. After installing basically all relevant or irrelevant drivers, either there is no response at all, no signal, or one connection port can work, but the others cannot succeed. In short, you should have to doubt and wonder whether the desktop or laptop you own is compatible. However, this brand, WAVLINK is almost plug-and-play. As long as the driver is installed successfully, it can immediately be displayed on the external monitors smoothly. It is simple and easy to use. You don’t have to worry about whether your computer is too old or whether your USB is too outdated. It lags behind, even when I connect it on USB2.0 instead of the required USB3.0, it works normally, which is amazing. Moreover, even the latest version of Windows 10 or Windows 11 already comes with related software driver packages, which is quite unexpected. Second, the customer service of this product is really great, almost all questions are answered and directly addressed, and very timely. It is more careful and conscientious than Amazon's own customer service to be honest. Long story short, After a period of happy use, I discovered a hardware Reset problem, so I tried to contact their customer service through Q&A Email. After receiving my question, the customer team not only inquired carefully about the situation and hardware environment, but also asked me to take screenshots as much as possible, because some key questions were easily expressed in inaccurate and vague language, and it was more intuitive for them. and conveniently start the technical analysis they need. One question from me usually will lead them to three or four questions and ideas, all honestly are more than I thought. This communication was great because finding out what the problem was was what they exactly wanted and it was their service attitude that totally earned my respect. In the customer service aspect, sometimes patience and professionalism are necessary, but enthusiasm and attitude are the most important. The Japanese god of management has a famous saying, that is, "It is necessary to immerse yourself in dreams so that we can have the enthusiasm to make them a reality." Therefore By purchasing products from WAVLINK, you may be able to experience the high-quality products and the passion behind them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Werkt perfect op elke USB of USB-c poort. Dankzij de driver functioneert dit product niet als 'verloopje' maar als externe videokaart. Top product.

reviews.reviewTitle: jusqu'à 4 écrans externes sur un même port
reviews.reviewText: Cet adaptateur est tout de même assez impressionnant puisque ses 4 prises video sont utilisables en même temps.Comme mentionné sur la fiche, ce n'est pas compatible MacOS qui ne supporte malheureusement pas le MST (multi stream transport - qui permet d'avoir plusieurs flux videos sur un port), mais sur windows, vous pourrez brancher 4 écrans.Quelques points négatifs :Les ports USB sont à la norme USB 2.0, donc parfaitement adaptés pour brancher souris, clavier, éventuellement une clé usb pour des fichiers de tailles raisonnables, mais un port USB 3.0 sur les 3 aurait été appréciable.Aussi, il n'y a pas de port USB-C de charge, donc c'est un hub à éviter pour les ordinateurs qui n'ont qu'un seul port USB-C qui est également utilisé pour la charge.Si ces limitations sont compatibles avec votre utilisation, alors ça reste un très bon hub qui gère un nombre élevé de sorties vidéos.
